messageBody:
> I searched the archives but wasn't able to find what I was looking
> for. If this has already been discussed a pointer to the thread
> would be appreciated.

That's how I tests for even: I register a mock listener:

public void testXYZ() {
MockListener mock = new MockListener();
myClass.addListener(mock);
myClass.callMethodThatFiresEvent();
assertEquals(1, mock.eventFired);
}

with MockListener something like:

public class MockListener implements MyListener {

int eventFired = 0;

public void theEventMethod() {
eventFired++;
}
}

But I don't know if it would work in your situation.
